name: Goo Fighter

description: Discover the fascinating world of the zodiac signs as you embark on a journey to win the heart of the boy of your dreams.

name: Doomed Urbex
description: Doomed Urbex is a community project first started last year by RastaManGames, with the concept of being a wad focused mainly on city maps

name: Naughty & Nice
description: PUSS XXXIV brings you 30 Doommas maps split evenly into two episodes."The Nice List" features more easy-going maps that heavily feature our cuddly bunny friends running amok as we slay demons. Perfect for those who want to enjoy a "chill" Christmas-themed wad. "The Naughty List" provides some intense maps that are generally more "cooked". If micro-slaughter, slaughter, lots of Cyberdemons and Archviles, and combat puzzles are your jam, this is the episode for you.

name: V64
description: A vanilla-compatible community mapset inspired by dotQLL's GADOLINIUM, where maps don't exceed the limit of 64 vertices.

name: Strength & Skill: Guiness Book of Records
description: Strength & Skill: Guiness Book of Records was produced by Sun/Kitco in 1984.

name: Voice in the Abyss
description:
Voice in the Abyss is an 8 map CL9/Boom megawad where doom guy hears voice calling him deeper into the the madness. Fight your way through the demonic hordes
to the end to see what surprises await you.
After the end of the games you will be sent to a new game pulse version of the maps where the difficulty is increased or start at map 09 to start out on the new game pulse difficulty.

name: Specter Spelunker Resizes
description:
Specter Spelunker Resizes is a demake of Specter Spelunker Shrinks by Ken Grafals.
Your goal is to get to the moon once again.. but this time it hides a prize!

name: Pop'n Music 4: Append Disc
description: Pop'n Music 4 is one of the many titles in Konami's long-running rhythm game franchise, and the second of two "Append Discs" that require either pop'n music 2 or another Key Disc in the series in order to play. This particular release includes new music from the arcade version, and also restores the Beginner mode that has been previously removed from the home releases.

name: MadnessMadnessMadness
description: Escape the wall, in a bizarre, circular world where the path comes at you through 360 degrees and disappears underneath. Survive as long as you can. Includes online highscores. Made for Game Jolt Minimal Contest.

name: Acid R[ai/eig]n
description: In Acid R[ai/eig]n, you are in control of the growth of a tree. You can use Z and X to rotate the curvature of branches currently growing. Every three seconds, branches will split into two separate ones. As the tree ages, or as acid rain makes contact with it, it begins to die. Holes will start to form in branches, which need to be patched up. The game ends when 100 droplets of acid rain hit the floor.

name: Confusion Readily Achieved Perspectively Through Unrealistic Relative Dimensions
description: Fake-3D 3D platformer designed to be rather confusing but perfectly playable in its presentation. Looks kinda snazzy though.

name: The Cat That Got the Milk
description: The Cat that Got the Milk is a reflex action game inspired by the Art of past Masters.

name: Metro.Siberia
description:
A very simple and addicting game inspired by the well known helicopter game, but unlike the helicopter game this game contains do not contain randomly generated levels, so your skill is all that counts.

The game (and editor) was built by Tommy Salomonsson, and the art and music was created by Simon Stålenhag. The game has been played more than 10 million times since it was released in late 2007, and they have released one spinoff of the game called “People in planes”.

name: We Are Infinity
description:
A short game trying to mimic the gameplay and atmosphere of "This Is Infinity", a game by Cactusquid / Jonatan Söderström.

If you find yourself confused, the best thing to do is to stand still for a moment and let the view settle.

name: NetWalk
description: NetWalk is a puzzle game developed and published by Gamos in 1996.

name: Keep It Running
description:
It's the time of the Industrial Revolution and you're a worker whom just applied to work at a mysterious toy factory. Unfortunately for you, this factory is unlike any other, its machinery and lack of safety being the lesser dangers to your life. And every day gets more and more challenging...

You're tasked with keeping the production of mysterious toys going at any cost. Your many tasks include keeping the boiler at a good pressure, making sure the steam engine drives the machinery at the right pace and keeping the machinery itself in working order. All whilst your boss constantly keeps an eye on you.
Displease your boss in any way and this will be the last day you did anything, ever.

Can you deal with the stress of working for this monster?

name: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game
description: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game is an action adventure game that brings the Pirates of the Caribbean world and all its colorful characters to life in LEGO Brick form. Players experience all the memorable scenes from all four films in the humorous and quirky LEGO Video Games style.

name: Manbomber
description:
An explosive homage to the old-time multiplayer classic made with PICO-8! In this game, your goal is to drop bombs on the battlefield to eliminate all other players in time and be the last manbomber standing.

The game can be played with up to 4 players battling each other. While in the 2-player mode, both players can use the same keyboard to control their manbomber, a controller for each player is required for all other modes. Any Controller which can be connected to your device will do!

name: Lizard Tower: The Abyss
description: Throw flares at the beacons. You know how it is.

name: Hellfire Poncho
description: Hellfire Poncho is a western rogue-lite isometric shooter. Shoot little demons with your upgraded weapons, die, and try again stronger. Bet your upgrades against the creatures you meet in the saloon, and develop your best build. Don't push your luck....

name: Aprende con Horacio: La Gran Aventura de las Palabras
description: "La gran aventura de las palabras" (The Great Adventure of Words), also known as "Aprende con Horacio" (Learn with Horacio), is an educational game by the Anaya publishing house where you play with the great Horacio, Rodolfato, and Alfabeto, crossing their entire labyrinth house full of puzzles, reading challenges, and all sorts of language-related games.

name: Black Mesa: Classic
description:
This is a GoldSource project aimed to recreate Black Mesa: Source feel within Half-LIfe 1 and its assets.

Our main goals for this project is to give a new feel, look to the original Half-Life, with adding more features, improved level design that many people love from Black Mesa remake but with additional things, to make it a bit more unique. Black Mesa: Classic aims to be capabile on any PC without high requiremnts, with better visuals and effects to make your Half-Life 1 campaign experience the best!

name: Qubit's Quest
description: You and up to three friends are on a quest to protect the loyal robotic canine, Qubit, in this action platformer. Play a co-op adventure campaign or compete with others in 10 fast-paced minigames!

name: Moussacre

name: Run and Gun
description: Run and Gun is an action roguelike shooting game where you mow down thousands of enemies while unlocking newer and deadlier weapons. The enemies won't stop spawning, and your guns won't stop firing. Earn gold each run to unlock permanent upgrades to make your next run deadlier.

name: Undertale: Chara Boss Fight

name: Flappy Camel

name: Game Grumps: The Video Game

name: The Dark Debt
description: The Dark Debt is a deep web horror-survival game developed by Voidlight Games.

name: Station Sabotage
description:
A multiplayer adventure set in the depths of space. Unravel mysteries, strategize for survival, and explore the unknown in this captivating cosmic escapade.

Station Sabotage invites players into a shadowy, futuristic world of mystery and survival. Aboard a forsaken space station, teams of explorers face unknown challenges and hidden dangers. In this multiplayer adventure, strategy and cooperation are key as players encounter an array of obstacles and enigmatic threats. The heart of the game lies in its unique, suspense-filled objectives, where choices have lasting consequences on the game's progression and the unfolding narrative.

The game's immersive environment is heightened by its dynamic design, where no two playthroughs are alike, and unexpected twists keep players constantly on their toes. With a variety of roles to assume, each player's experience is tailored to their decisions and interactions within this treacherous space station.

Station Sabotage combines elements of mystery, strategy, and survival, making each session a fresh journey into the unknown. It's more than just a game – it's an ever-evolving story waiting to be unravelled.

description:
'Home; a dying breeze, in the peripherals of my vision, to chase until the end of time.'

Our Long Walk Home is a surreal, horror RPG about a student caught in an infinitely repeating walk home as their world crumbles around them. A story about expectations, reflections, and a missing half.

description: Released for Sega Pico on December 1995 in Japan only, and the first game based on the manga and anime Kaitou Saint Tail.

name: JunkMetal
description:
JunkMetal is a MMOFPSRPG developed by Metro and published by Enix in 2003.

It features a high degree of customization, allowing players to mix and match various parts and weapons for their robots, as well as different operating systems and software.

Also, it emphasizes PvP (player versus player) combat, where players can join one of two rival factions, POF or Infinity, or remain as freelancers.

name: Daughters of the Stars
description:
Evelyn Lima is a 15 year old sophomore who's simply trying to get by in high school. All she wants is to spend time with her best friends in peace, not be bothered by bullies, and get through high school without any incident. That all changes in the new year of 199X, as she awakens to magical powers from the cosmos, and now has to figure out why she of all people has them.

Daughters of the Stars is an episodic visual novel starring Evelyn Lima, which takes place in New York in 199X. Play as her as she navigates school, daily life, hanging out with friends, and going against bullies and bad guys.

name: Daughters of the Stars Episode 1: When A Star Burns Out, A Flower Blooms
description: Evelyn Lima is starting the second semester of her Sophomore year of high school. When she discovers magical powers and has to fight a monster, everything she thought she knew changes.

name: Daughters of the Stars Episode 2: Face the Setting Sun: A Fierce Flower Stands Strong!
description: It's been a week since Eve first transformed into her magical girl alter ego, but she hasn't been able to transform since. When a fierce enemy attacks her and her friends after school, one she can't stop on her own, a new magical girl stands up to stop it.

name: Chakusin Melody Damon
description: Chakushin Melody Damon is an utility for creating music and sound, and also features a collection of melodies and sounds for using in mobile phones. Release in Japan for PS1.

description: Uncover clues to unlock forgotten memories.

name: Sea of Stars: Early Backer Limited Edition
description:
Comes with an exclusive booklet, available only for early Kickstarter backers.

Sea of Stars is a turn-based RPG inspired by the classics. Promising the Sabotage touch in every system, Sea of Stars aims to modernize the classic RPG in terms of turn-based combat, storytelling, exploration and interactions with the environment, while still offering a hearty slice of nostalgia and good old, simple fun.

Early Backer Limited Edition includes:
- Sea of Stars physical edition
- Acrylic Standee
- Silver Enamel Pin
- Original Soundtrack 2-Disc Digipak
- 12"x16" Poster
- Instruction Booklet

name: Touhou Shifuujou: The Alternative Age
description: Touhou Shifuujou ...the Alternative Age is a fanmade Touhou Project shoot 'em up game developed by danmaq, best known for his later fangame Concealed the Conclusion. It is one of the earliest games made using the Danmakufu engine, as well as one of the earliest fanmade Touhou-style STGs.

Experience the storyline with various NPCs as you join the team to build and develop the small island!

name: Yamafuda! Summit
description: Enjoy casual mountain hiking using cards, the latest in the "YAMAFUDA! series. This time, you and your friends will hike the mountain in a party. Let's enjoy many more mountains!

name: YourFigureOut
description: YourFigureOut - geometrical point-and-click game, where you use the mouse and left-clicking, set the direction and speed of the flight of your figure, which should not touch the walls and dodge hostile figures that are trying to push you against the wall!

name: Zombie Woods
description: An action rogue-like zombie game, please collect enough weapons during the day to survive the night.

name: Word Relay
description: Word Relay offers a unique blend of casual, competitive, and educational elements. Each player enters a word in their turn that could maximize their score under some rules. Enjoy games with family and friends, be part of global competition, and expand your vocabulary with new words.

name: Xplosive Raccoon
description: Xplosive Raccoon - is a point-and-click game where you have to aim the dynamite, throw using the mouse cursor while holding the left mouse button and select the force of the throw. Use the explosion to send fish ashore and earn money, the faster you pay off your debt, the faster you can go home.

name: World of Tanks: Snatch Gift Pack
description: Limited-time offer: Claim your "Snatch Gift Pack" DLC! This exclusive DLC features essential supplies so you can be prepared for any battle!

name: 100 Cats Berlin

name: 100 Cats Pakistan

name: 13 Seconds
description: [13 Seconds] is a hardcore bullet hell roguelike game.Use both hands to control two robots at the same time and fight your way through a barrage of bullets and death rays from merciless machines of destruction!Will you be able to reach the ultimate level 13?

name: 50CK3T
description: A story-based indie platform puzzler set in a post-apocalyptic city. Socket and Birdie jump, swing, and build their way through increasingly difficult puzzles as they're shared battery continually drains.

name: 99 Waves
description: 99 Waves is a casual platformer rogue-lite game about a vengeful young man who challenges a god. Can he defeat countless monsters, the greatest warriors, and mythical beings to reach the despicable god and become a legend?

name: AAS Mos Apocalypse
description: A small accident was occurred in the laboratory, which lead to an apocalypse. Not just an apocalypse, but a 'mos apocalypse'. What's a Mos? It's is a bigger version of a mosquito. Those mos are the reason many people have gone missing. Play as every member of the AAS team and stop the apocalypse!

name: Abnimality
description: Abnimality is a platformer game with racing elements, explosions and a physical world, where the player uses explosions to control his character, who must jump to the end of the level before the others.

name: Abstract Code
description: Embark on a unique gaming experience that delves into thought-provoking themes... this SHMUP/Visual Novel hybrid offers a compelling narrative interspersed with addictive arcade gameplay.

name: Abstracto
description: Abstracto is a Retro-Inspired, Hack N' Slash, Combat-Oriented Platformer, with a deep combat system that lets you play your way. Play as Forte a blue square on a quest to defeat the evil Immotus and save the strange land of the Abstract.

name: Abyssal Frontier
description: You just wanted to finish your cargo run. The universe had other plans, Abyssal Frontier is a choice-driven cosmic horror visual novel with light RPG elements, time loop mechanics, and dating sim suggestions.

name: Abyss of Light
description: In a near-future interstellar mission, our vessel is shattered by asteroids, leaving you as the sole survivor. You land on a mysterious celestial body, facing unknown challenges and hidden secrets. Will you persevere?

name: Ace Pilot Pacific
description: Ace Pilot Pacific is a top view air combat game. The action takes place during the WW2 Pacific war. Fly in 6 different planes against the Japanese. Dog fight with the help of your wingmen and become an Ace.

name: Abyss: New Dawn
description: Dive into the enchanting world of Abyss: New Dawn - A cozy game that combines farming, town-building, and adventure in which you explore the ancient wonders with many mysterious Abyss floors alone or with your friends.

name: Afallon
description: Explore the dynamic world of Afallon as one of eight powerful classes, each with three specializations, in a 40 square kilometer open-world singleplayer RPG that evolves with your progress, offering challenging dungeons, crafting professions, and unique companions for your adventure.

name: A Fascinating Story: Wedding Night
description: This is a very simple card flip game where you turn over a card and then try to find another matching card. You only need to click on the card to find the same card as the image that appears, and the identical ones will be eliminated.

name: Age of History 3
description: Grand strategy wargame where the destiny of Civilizations rests in your hands - will they stand united under your leadership or fall divided in conflict? Journey through the entire saga of human civilization, from its earliest days to the futuristic era, crafting your legacy age by age.

name: A-Girl: New Character B
description: The 'dlc' includes a brand new adorable character.

name: Agrarian developer
description: "Agrarian developer" is a simulation business game where players can construct farms, ranches, workshops, and castles. It is important to pay attention to penalties in missions and manage gold coins wisely to avoid bankruptcy.

name: AlchePot
description: A fantastic but difficult Bullet Hell. Shoot enemies all around. Experience the unique 'Bullet Absorb' system by stop firing, change threaten to your energy. Get ability upgrade through 8 levels with well-designed atmosphere.

name: Alaa: Mogus Must Die
description: This is a historical action game from 3rd person based on Yakut mythology. Alaa-Mogus the devil has come to seize our land! Uraankhai Sakha, let's take up our weapons and drive him back to the dungeon! Uruy-Aikhal!

name: AirportSim: Rovaniemi Airport
description: Welcome to Rovaniemi Airport! This new airport for AirportSim, which is nestled in the heart of Finnish Lapland, is not just an ordinary airport; it's the gateway to the magical home of Santa Claus and a bridge to the Arctic wonders.

name: Aim Zen
description: Aim Zen combines classic aim training with musical innovation to elevate precision. Dive into an unparalleled FPS experience, designed for all skill levels, where rhythm and gameplay merge for an engaging challenge.

name: Aim Down Screen
description: Aim Down Screen is the Gun Smith for your Screen! Go beyond putting clear tape with a dot in the middle on your monitor and customize your reticles and HUD with Aim Down Screen!

name: Super Algebrawl
description: Add up, multiply, clone, and divide your party members to beat the monsters on your path!

name: Ace Triad
description: Get involved in an adventure full of strategic challenges and exciting twists and turns as you seek to win the title of dueling master.

name: Adorimon: Arena of Ancients
description: Explore fantastic creatures called "Adorimon" in a new 2D turn-based strategy game! Collect and train your Adorimons to discover the world, climb Challenge Tower, and duel other players in Arena.

name: A Difficult Game About Climbing
description: This is a difficult game about climbing.

name: Adapta Solva
description: Absorb elements from magical shrines to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles in this cute and short little adventure where you follow a magical creature in a world laid to ruin by an unknown cause.

name: A Christmassy Christmas
description: "Beneath the festive cheer, Santa's wrath draws near. Naughty souls, tremble in fear, for judgment day is finally here." A Christmassy Christmas is an arena roguelike survival game where Santa disposes of naughty children.

name: Aery: Stone Age
description: In Aery – Stone Age you play as a little flying spirit that watches humanity in its early states evolve. You will discover a long-forgotten land with beautiful environments, and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Aery: Cyber City
description: In Aery Cyber City you play a little bird on its journey to find a home after losing its dear friend. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Aery: Ancient Empires
description: In Aery - Ancient Empires you play as a little bird-like spirit that watches ancient civilizations evolve. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Advaria: Chronicles of Immortality
description: Welcome, my Lord, to the cursed kingdom. A land plagued by black magic and creatures that crawl out of the darkness. Once this was a great kingdom. It could be great again. That's all up to you. Enter the world of Advaria - a hero defense game set in a world of fantasy and adventure.

name: Adventure Mansion
description: Explore Adventure Mansion with friends—dynamic mysteries, changing landscapes, and unexpected roles. Every twist unveils new challenges in this blend of horror, suspense, and fantasy. An immersive experience awaits—grab a friend or gather a group for a unique journey each time!

name: Adventure Trip: Amazing World 3 - Collector's Edition
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

name: Ancient Warriors
description: Ancient Warriors - is a strategic defense game where you summon warriors, set traps, and use a powerful arsenal to repel waves of diverse enemies. Face epic bosses, adapt your strategy, and upgrade your defenders to become the kingdom's legendary savior.

name: Ancings: The First Tournament
description: Ancings is a dynamic turn-based strategic fighting video game. As you win battles, you gain levels, new powers and new evolutions. Each enemy is unique, so they all have different attacks and different ways of approaching battle. Plan your strategy well to win.

name: Algolemeth
description: "Create AI and Conquer the Dungeon." Algolemeth is a dungeon RPG where you send golems equipped with AI (combat logic) into a dungeon for fully automated exploration. Enhance the AI and, through trial and error, aim to conquer the dungeon!

name: Alterhavoc
description: Alterhavoc is a Rogue-like Bullet hell game where players have to survive and fight monsters with an Inventory system where the resources can be arranged in a limited area to receive additional buffs.

name: Alpha League
description: Alpha League is a free-to-play, hero based Auto Chess. In Alpha League, simply pick and build your favorite hero in a Roguelike fashion with 10 different combat genres, and then battle the other 7 Bots or Players to be the winner.

name: Alparslan
description: Alparslan is Turkey's first RPG Themed, Open World Mafia game. Growing up in the seediest underworld, Alparslan vows to fight all his enemies until he becomes the most respected bully in Ankara. An action game with a Deep State Mafia storyline set in Ankara from a TPS perspective.

name: All New Origins
description: Small scaled "Mini" Fantasy RPG where you create your own character, remember forgotten spells, find new mystical items, and have the chance to experience multiple paths and endings in the game.

name: All-Mountain Hucker
description: In All-Mountain Hucker, the player performs Stylish tricks in the post-apocalyptic Alaskan mountains while gunning down enemies with an arsenal of ranged weaponry. Go down the mountain on your snowboard to wipe out the enemy faction and take revenge on their leader.

name: A Million Murder Mysteries
description: Step into the thrilling world of "A Million Murder Mysteries," where every second counts and every word holds the key to solving a gripping case. This intense text-based detective game challenges your analytical skills and deductive reasoning as you race against time to unravel a million mysteries.

name: American Truck Simulator: Kenworth T680 2022
description: The moment we've all been eagerly waiting for is finally here! We're thrilled to announce the release of the much-anticipated Kenworth T680 100 Years Anniversary Edition for American Truck Simulator.

name: Jammin' With Mario
description:
Jammin' With Mario is a 2006 McDonald's browser game that was made as a part of the September 2006 Mario Happy Meal promotion. The game was supposedly a music game that taught the player how to play the Mario theme with their keyboard.

As of 2025, no gameplay or builds of the game have resurfaced online and no archives for the swf files are indexed on the Wayback Machine.

name: Annyversaire
description: This is a 2D exploration adventure game set in a small town. Discovering items and encounters in this cold winter, here as the start of a beginning.

name: Anominal
description: A 2D platformer with a twist: instant teleportation! Solve brain-scratching puzzles, engage in adrenaline-pumping traversary, and discover the purpose within.

name: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
description: Another Farm Roguelike Rebirth is a strategic farming roguelike where you craft, build, gather, and manage to earn money for the increasing rent. Level up, raise animals, and buy new lands. Everything is possible with a bit of money.

name: Another Hardest Game
description: Welcome to the skillful world of "Another Hardest Game," where you control a small ball-shaped robot, aspiring to break free from a mysterious place.

name: Antimatter Drive: Duel
description: Dive into a strategic space odyssey! In this hex-based board game, build your starship, navigate through a dynamic universe, and make critical decisions. Featuring asymmetric gameplay with unique alien races and an innovative board design. Conquer and unravel the star mysteries!

name: Antiquarium
description: Prepare to discover hidden artifacts in an extraordinary antiquarium. Attend to customers, put enigmatic object fragments together, and solve bonus puzzles. Immerse yourself in the Antiquarium's ancient ambiance for hours of enjoyable and entertaining exploration!

name: Antishoot
description: ANTISHOOT is a first-person action, fast-paced shooter where your only goal is to defeat the creatures that come to kill you. Shoot and rocket-jump through enemies to gain glory on the leaderboards

name: Antivira
description: "Antivira" is a rogue-like platformer game where realistic combat movements blend with a stylized aesthetic. Take control of a robot and strive to escape from the factory where you were created by completing all the levels.

name: Apeiron
description: Apeiron is an Open World Third-Person Story-Driven Action RPG set in a fantasy-created setting known as the Realm of Paradise, where you play as four companions. In Eternity, experience unique combat through our weapon stance system and progressing gameplay, creating immersive ability combinations.

name: An Unusual Cadence
description: Join Airia, a small town bard, as she summons all her courage to save the land in peril. Can you uncover the secret of The Legendary Instruments in time?

name: Ani-Chess
description: Join a delightful and leisurely turn-based game with adorable cartoon animals, embarking on a puzzle-filled adventure. Challenge opponents and progress on the game board. Form a formidable team and navigate through challenges together.

name: Animal Game
description: A 3D turn-based creature collector RPG where you catch and battle unimaginable creatures after being sent to a strange new world. Experience the full story mode as you fight through bad guys - and various bystanders - in a reimagined 2v2 battle system that adds new elements to classic RPG combat.

name: Animalistic Worlds
description: An Open-World RPG that takes place in a world where anthropomorphic animals try to live like humans used to in modern society, but often fail miserably due to their animal instincts.

name: Animal Race Party
description: In Animal Race Party, the main objective is to race through tracks, collecting gold stars to secure victory. Each player can choose from six cute animals, each possessing a unique skill that can be strategically used to gain an advantage.

name: Animal Shelter 2
description: Welcome back to the heartwarming world of Animal Shelter 2! Provide a loving home for every four-legged friend in need – play with them, pet them, even dress them up! Get to know them and find them a loving family. Play with your friends and manage your shelter together in co-op!

name: Mario's Driving Range
description:
Mario's Driving Range is a 2006 McDonald's browser game that was made as a part of the September 2006 Mario Happy Meal promotion. The game was released alongside the game Jammin' With Mario on the McDonald's Happy Meal website.

It's not currently known what the contents of the game were, however it is rumored to be a golf game. As of 2025, no gameplay footage or builds of the game have resurfaced online and no archives for the swf files are indexed on the Wayback Machine.

name: Area 51: Beyond The Wall
description: Join the top-secret mission to defend Area 51, the world's most enigmatic military base. With fast paced action, realistic combat, and a dynamic environment, 'Area 51: Beyond the Wall' will immerse you in a thrilling and challenging experience. Play now and see if you have what it takes!

name: Area 37
description: Area 37 is a 16-bit retro action platform game, set in a post-apocalyptic world dominated by machines, where the protagonist, Pink, risks his life performing dangerous missions to earn money.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Battle Royale F2P Edition
description: The Iconic Block-Breaker Returns! Embrace for free the intensity of the Battle Royale, thanks to the Eternal Battle Mode, up to 25 players online. Play now for free and try to reach the top of the leaderboard. Additional modes are available for separate purchase.

name: Archer Training
description: It is an action shooting game from a third-person perspective. Aim for the goal while hitting the target.

name: Architech
description: Explore a game you design! Team up with the game itself as the player-developer line blurs. Action? Adventure? RPG? Shooter? Tower Defense? Bullet Hell? Easy? Hard? Your game-Your rules. Fire arrows, slash halberds, deploy towers, shoot lasers! Upgrade yourself and the monsters and win your way

name: Archons
description: Archons is a roguelite / survivor where you control two characters at the same time, the Archons. Upgrade your Archons with different weapons to blast your way through the hordes of parasites and gigantic bosses. Customize your upgrades to build your own unique playstyle.

name: ArcaneOutpost
description: A strategy game that combines MOBA and Tower Defence, You would control guardians with different skills，building your outpost to fend off enemy attacks.

name: Arcane Weave
description: Embark as an Apprentice Wizard in a spellbinding puzzle platformer. Engage in turn-based combat against the malevolent Queen Witch, solving puzzles, navigating enchanting landscapes, and using spells strategically. Unravel magical threads to bring lasting peace to your kingdom.

name: Archers on the Hunt
description: In this game, you will have to fight off crowds of enemies that are coming in large numbers. You play as a ranger, who with the help of a magic bow shoots off the evil.

name: AquaRevive
description: Dive into AquaRevive, a VR game in a glass dome battling algal bloom pollution. Armed with a dynamic chemical ball, you must destroy illuminated targets to save the ecosystem. Face waves of challenges, testing your speed and accuracy in a race against time.

name: Apple Hero
description: Apple Hero is a puzzle game in which you lead the hero to the goal. Create a path for the hero by placing apples, BUT the twist is that the hero always moves only to the closest apple. Avoid dangers, collect coins and solve all the puzzles!

name: Apocalypse Party & 20 Minutes Till Dawn: Free Thanking DLC
description: This thrilling free DLC combines with "20 Minutes Till Dawn's" strategic depth. Cross-game heroes infuse "Apocalypse Party" with tactics and abilities. With three innovative weapons and talents, players now have more ways to combat and strategize in this end-of-days showdown.

name: Apex Ninja
description: This is a fast-paced action-adventure game. Five female ninjas are trapped in a time loop set by the Demon Lord. Become the Ninja King and break the time loop!

name: As Above So Below
description: As Above So Below (AASB) is as a gravity-shifting 2d side-scrolling platformer enhanced by fantastical abilities and a unique cast of characters set within an expansive fictional world inspired by Greek mythos.

name: Armored Brigade II
description: Armored Brigade II revolutionizes real-time tactical warfare in 3D, focusing on the intense combined arms combat of the Cold War era, from 1965 to 1991. Boasting a meticulously researched database and huge real-world terrain maps, this game offers an unparalleled combat simulation experience.

name: Arrowstorm Ascendant
description: Defeat hordes of dragons and wyverns using your outstanding elvish archery skills. Create the most insane combination of upgrades and get your name into the leaderboards, showcasing all your might and glory!

name: Arsenal Online: Customization Pack
description: Unlock all Target and Vehicle styles and automatically receive new styles in future updates!

name: Arsenal Online: Skins Pack
description: Unlock all weapon and attachment skins and automatically unlock new skins in future updates!

name: Arsenal Online: Super Weapons Pack
description: Unlock all Super Weapons and automatically receive new Super Weapons in future updates!

name: Atomic Owl
description: Atomic Owl is a pixel art-based single-player, side-scrolling roguelike that combines fast-paced platforming with dynamic hack-and-slash combat and a variety of weapons, powerups, and a demonic blade. Journey through eight roguelike zones, save your friends, and take up arms against Omega Wing!

name: Atlas Wars
description: Join the epic world of Atlas Wars, a fast-paced skill-based multiplayer brawler! Choose unique heroes, master awesome abilities, and battle in crazy and unique arenas. Atlas Wars offers an action-packed brawl experience!

name: Atlas Ablaze
description: When 16 year old Andi falls for the last person her parents would approve of, she seems to have trouble processing the severity of her girlfriend's situation. Cute visuals and crude humor helps to mask dark topics in the way that puts you in the headspace of a teenage girl trying to shut it all out.

name: At His Grave
description: Time backtracking secret room decryption game, analyze the character dialogue, find the key to decryption, complete the needs to leave the room. In the end all regret, go back to the past, looking for clues to make up for regret.

name: Auspicious Light
description: “Auspicious Light”is a tactical competitive game with novel gameplay, exquisite graphics and stunning scenes. Players maneuver vehicles, collect materials, forge vehicles, recast modules, match chips and utilize exquisite tactics and strategies to defeat enemies and achieve combat goals.

name: Autocrats
description: Autocrats is a first-person strategy survival role-playing game. You can play as an autocrat, commander, or independent. Survive in an open world in first-person mode. Establish and develop your own country as an autocrat. Intervene militarily or economically in other countries

name: Aussie Rules Coach
description: Aussie Rules coaching game, setup your team and watch them play!

name: A Winter Haunting
description: Everlyn Sterling, a young woman tasked by her grandmother to take care of a historic mansion, finds herself entangled in a mystery involving supernatural forces. Join her in this point-and-click style game to uncover the secrets behind this landmark!

name: AvatarCard
description: A national interactive card game where each player can have their own limited card and engage in multiplayer battles in classic TCG gameplay

name: Avalanca: Mythos
description: Explore the mysteries of Odonis Orphane in the bonus DLC for Avalanca. Equip cutting-edge weaponry, face new alien threats, and unlock extraterrestrial powers. The cosmos awaits – are you ready for the alien odyssey?

name: Avalanca: Divinity - Belfy Bastion
description: Dive into the enchanting realm of Avalanca once again with the thrilling DLC expansion, Belfry Bastion. This immersive tower defense game seamlessly blends the captivating characters and lore of Avalanca with strategic gameplay, offering players a fresh experience within the beloved universe.

name: Automobilista 2: Endurance Pack Pt1
description: The initial pack of ultimate Endurance racing cars featuring four new GT3 Gen2 cars along with three LMDh Hypercars.

name: Automobilista 2: Circuit des 24 Heures du Mans
description: The mecca of Endurance racing arrives to AMS2! Modelled with the aid of detailed laser scan data this DLC features the modern 24h track along with its shorter Bugatti layout.

name: Ascend Factory
description: Welcome to Ascend Factory, a factory simulation game that challenges your ingenuity and resource management skills. Immerse yourself in a world of automation and strategic planning as you progress through levels of increasing complexity!

name: Ash the Cat
description: A dark-humor 3D platforming adventure in the style of Conker's Bad Fur Day.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: GT2 Pack
description: The GT2 Pack introduces 6 new GT2 cars as well as the iconic european track, The Red Bull Ring Content Red Bull Ring KTM X-Bow GT2 Porsche 935 Maserati MC20 GT2 Mercedes-AMG GT2 Audi R8 LMS GT2 Porsche 911 GT2 RS Clubsport Evo

name: Astra Strike
description: Astra Strike is a team-based first-person tactical shooter set in the near future. Players play as one agent In the main game mode, players are assigned to either the attacking or defending team with each team having five players on it. Players have abilities.

name: Atan
description: Atan is an action-adventure game where you traverse a massive colossal. Use your climbing skills together with your bow and anchors to journey over the massive giant. But beware, because this rough terrain contains many challenges, for the colossal itself is still alive and in need of your help.

name: AstroForge: Space Pirates
description: Build your unique spaceship and explore space. Travel between planets, fight different opponents, trade and develop. Build the most efficient ship and fight with other players in multiplayer. 17 languages available.

name: Axona
description: Axona is a grid-based puzzle game which requires 3-dimensional thinking and careful planning. Pick up the keys with the correct face of your cube and unlock the glyphs to open the gate in each level.

name: Baby Dino
description: Explore the realm of Raku in this dinosaur-themed RPG. Join clans, engage in battles, and lead ten diverse species to build a new kingdom. Guide Rexy, the last heir, in reclaiming his throne and restoring honor. Uncover the legacy of betrayal and shape the destiny of the kingdom.

name: Backrooms: Steps into the abyss
description: You are a member of the B.E.I. research team. You have to find a lost report.Your task is to explore these primitive spaces, find the report and return them to the base for further analysis. Use your ingenuity and skills to avoid danger.

name: Backrooms: Realm of Shadows - Full Version
description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey through the Backrooms: Realm of Shadows and discover what lies beyond the veil of reality. Are you prepared to face the shadows and unravel the mysteries that await in this dark and unforgiving realm? The adventure begins now - if you dare.

name: Backrooms Game No. 999999
description: Backrooms #999999999 is a singleplayer/4 player co-op horror exploration game. Unlock the puzzles, survive the entities, escape the deadly geometry and try to reach the final level in one piece. Good luck, wanderer!

name: Baderna: Um Conto de Barro
description: Face the mob with your clay dolls! Baderna: Um Conto de Barro is an action-adventure game set in the magical universe of Northeastern clay dolls. Help Cleiton save his village from the corrupted dolls in insanely challenging levels!

name: Baklava Simulator 2
description: In Baklava Simulator 2, you're in control of your baklava shop. Upgrade, create delightful treats, and serve customers strategically. With customizable features, security, and entertainment, this game is where flavor meets management. Dive into Baklava Simulator 2 and build your baklava empire! 🥮

name: Batman: The Dark Knight
description: Batman: The Dark Knight is an unreleased action-stealth game for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. The game was based on the movie of the same name. The game was cancelled in 2008.

name: Battle Clash
description: Battle Clash is a medieval multiplayer PVP game. On spawn, each player is randomly assigned a medieval class and forced to battle against other players. Reach a kill streak to unlock your class's ultimate attack, and dominate the battlefield. When the timer ends, the player with the most kills wins!

name: BattleDrive
description: Survive, Upgrade, Conquer. Race to victory in a relentless arena battle. Drift, unlock new cars, and defeat unique bosses!

name: BallCore
description: Precise, multiplayer platformer where you play as ball only able to move left and right.

name: Bass Invaders
description: Infinite Rhythm Action. Join Ace and PZO-116 as they repel alien invaders whose only weakness is music. Battle using any song from local files or online video with automatic beatmap generation. Nail the perfect run and top the leaderboard on your favourite tracks. Your music will save the world.

name: Beacon of the Bellrock
description: Beacon of the Bellrock is a small open-world farming/building game, where you as James Hocken have to build and equip a lighthouse for the Intergalactic Royal Navy. Be the guiding light in the vast intergalactic ocean!

name: Beacon of Havoc
description: Post-apocalyptic city builder, where you Build, Defend, and Thrive in a desolate landscape overrun by enemy attacks. Manage resources, production and manufacturing to expand your settlement.

name: Battlefall: State of Conflict
description: Engage in a post-apocalyptic RTS showdown between three factions in Battlefall: State of Conflict.

name: Battle Echoes
description: Take command of the mech and become the ultimate strategist. Construct impregnable defense facilities, handpick potent skills, lead your troops, and defy relentless enemy assaults. Will you emerge victorious in this thrilling battle for supremacy?

name: BattlePlatform
description: A 2D meat pigeon game featuring a moveable platform, place your turrets and buildings on a moveable and expandable platform, buy props from merchants and choose exclusive enhancements to create an impenetrable fortress and repel zombie attacks.

name: Bearly Delivered
description: A 3D physics-based package delivery game

name: Beetle Nest
description: Try yourself as a commander in the new Rouge-lite shooter with a top view! Upgrade your clones, explore planets, unlock new weapons and costumes. Don't let the waves of hostile creatures defeat you!

name: Before I Go
description: Before I Go is a challenging metroidvania with intense platforming and unforgiving battle action. Explore an otherworldly universe. Immerse yourself in this enigmatic tale. Face your greatest fear.

name: Being John
description: In the RogueLite-based life simulation game Being John, you help John to return to his old life after the events that have happened to him.

name: Be Not Afraid, But Run
description: Polluted with our better angels the ways bear hazards few dare challenge go, o messenger and heed these words: be not afraid but run.

name: Best Fighter
description: Best Fighter is a rogue-like exciting game where you fight with the most experienced fighters in search of glory and recognition. Use a wide arsenal of weapons - from blasters and firearms to axes and brass knuckles - to overcome your opponents. Choose unique tactics to survive and rise to the top.

name: Beyond Doors
description: Caleb woke up in a mystical dimension after experiencing burnout in his job. Door-to-door, guided by enigmatic musical notes, he needs to be reminded of his true calling. Immerse yourself in this mind-bending platformer.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 6 - Collector's Edition
description: AVIs new game "Trip to Europe 6" offers an exciting Christmas journey through the snowy European countries. Playing the game you will be able to find hidden objects in historical places in Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs.

name: Bike Ride 3D
description: Racing, cycling and horse riding have never been so much fun!

name: Bingle Bingle
description: Bingle Bingle is a 'Roulette Builder' game where you can create your own Roulette. Strategically combine various betting options and unique balls to create synergies, earn extreme scores, and beat the casino

name: BioGun: Clinical Trial
description: Prologue version of the game BioGun. Get injected into the microscopic world. Face viral threats and winding corridors on your mission to save man's best friend from the inside. Will you be the vaccine to save dog-kind from extinction?

name: Bionic Rebirth
description: Classic arcade first person shooter, survive the depths of a overrun facility controlled by power AI. Can you escape?

name: Birds vs. Dragons
description: Embark on an epic adventure in Birds vs Dragons, a breathtaking third-person shooting game. Tame birds and battle lethal dragons threatening to eliminate you from stunning platforms. Unleash your skills, save the planet, and experience the thrill in this action-packed saga!

name: Bioguard
description: Bioguard is a tower defense roguelite with a biological theme. Help the immune system using a variety of towers, skills and special cards. Develop your strategy to protect your body from invading pathogens and prevent their passage to vital organs!

name: Black stone
description: This is a very fun strategy game that tests players' strategies.

name: Birdtale
description: Ancient Chinese tale set during the fictitious Tianqi era of the Ming Dynasty, where the government madly hunts all birds. Assist common bird Shaohao in solving mysteries to discover the truth behind the madness. Some puzzles utilize computer system functions, posing no real threat to your machine.

name: Bisyntho
description: Bisyntho is a casual physics-based arcade game about combining orbs. Use and abuse the few tools provided to you in order to last as long as possible and push your high score to its limit.

name: Bitosphere
description: Embark on a Galactic Adventure in Bitosphere a Captivating 1-bit Clicker Game

name: Black Abyss
description: This is a super fun puzzle game where a white balloon bounces rhythmically up and down.

name: Bitty Knight
description: A fast-paced, challenging 2D top-down mini-roguelike with random levels and 30+ powerups. No two plays are ever the same and completely free-to-play. Avoid the many perils, collect copious loot and slay the final boss to escape the mini dungeon in Bitty Knight...

name: Blackout
description: A single-player zombies experience. Players are armed with diverse weapons, unique abilities, bullet types, and more to face relentless hordes of cunning enemies. Navigate the in-depth DnD-style progression system, in this riveting journey through an ever-increasing wave of undead threats.

name: Blade's Burden
description: Blade's Burden is a unique HD2D RPG where you're not the boring old hero. You're a Soulblade – a sentient, cursed sword that absorbs the souls of those who dare to grip your hilt. Explore the vast Germanic Folklore setting, take control of different factions, and use them to rebuild your empire!

name: Blaster Multiplayer
description: Thrust into the fray of Blaster Multiplayer, a tactical third-person shooter where strategy meets intense combat.

name: Blast Hopper
description: Help Hop survive his inner demons on his journey to the deepest depths of Subterranea to restore the severed link with the surface. Dive into an exhilarating Metroidvania-style 2D platformer adventure that blends classic platforming mechanics with the thrilling intensity of twin-stick shooting.

name: Blood On The Streets
description: Stepping into this open city, you will find a game world full of challenges and opportunities waiting for you to explore. In this free and open realm, engage in fierce gang wars with gangsters and mafia, challenging your strategy and leadership. Get ready to start a new life

name: Blood Engine
description: Blood Engine: Immerse yourself in an action-packed third-person open-world experience. Race against time to thwart the relentless Red Swarm. Will you emerge victorious, or succumb to the biomechanical onslaught? The fate of humanity rests in your hands.

name: Blocks for Babies
description: Blocks for Babies is the puzzle-shooter mashup of your dreams. Clear falling blocks by forming complete lines, or go in guns blazing to clean up the board the messy way. Hard and soft drops aren't your only tools anymore—now you have a shotgun.

name: Blossom
description: Embark on a quest of growth and exploration in a beautifully handcrafted open world. Explore the lands and discover their forgotten history. Are you ready to automate and expand your beautiful flora against the vile Corruption?

name: Blood Sins
description: Embark on a heroic quest in Harda, a kingdom threatened by dark forces from Wick. Unravel the mystery of Amrak's invasion, aided by allies like Jahnarr, Maugh, and Gonel. Your choices shape the fate of the realm. Can you restore peace to Harda?

name: Blood Vessel
description: First-person-slasher/shooter game. Bludgeon a cult of thirsting vampires to escape your apartment building.

name: Bloody Good Friends
description: Explore Mirian's world in the Bloody Good Friends visual novel! Spend time at school with her friends, learn about characters, interests, future plans and dreams! Just beware of the demons of the past that won't stop chasing you!

name: Bloody Shrine
description: Complete the ritual and defend the shrine in this top-down arena shooter roguelite. Unlock new demons, discover new weapons and choose the right spells and items. Create hell-breaking synergies that will unleash pain and suffering on all ghoulies, elites and bosses.

name: Blast Them All
description: Reload your weapon, the show's about to start! Blast Them All is a wave-based twin stick shooter where you face endless hordes of hungry zombies. Use your agility, pick up weapons and activate traps to defend yourself, build up your strength, collect points and reach the top of the leaderboard!

name: Blinding Light
description: A cooperative action tower defense and third-person shooter where vision is mutually exclusive. Place towers to shine light on the endless horde of bugs, or use augmented vision to fight alongside defenses. Equip powerful modules that unleash your strategy's true potential!

name: Block Connector
description: You are the block and now you have to connect the colourful blocks to defeat your enemy, the polyhedron.

name: Block Defend
description: BlockDefend is a rougeLite tower defense game. You need to allocate the resources and build up as many advanced units as possible, to defend your town against waves of increasingly powerful monsters!

name: Block Hunter
description: Block Hunter is a music rhythm game that combines party game, online and local competitions, and maybe rogue-lite genes.hope you guys enjoy it !

name: Sukfaristo
description: 2048 like fruit merging game with fluid simulation

name: Threads of You: Beyond the Bay
description: 1 broken down car, 2 weeks in a hidden seaside town, and 7 men waiting to sweep you off your feet. Will you follow the threads of destiny in Brine Bay?

name: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki
description: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki is the fifth installment in the main Kiseki series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the The Legend of Heroes: Zero no Kiseki and the ending to the Crossbell arc. The game follows the Special Support Section with more members and more cases to solve.

name: Pokémon Shiny Gold Version
description: A fan made remake of Pokémon Gold that was made from FireRed's engine.

name: Pico Valley
description: Pico Valley is a Stardew Valley demake for PICO-8.

name: Pico Life
description: Pico Life is a demake of Half-Life in PICO-8.

name: Shipwrecked 64
description:
A recovered copy of a lost game from the late 1990s about a Beaver named Bucky and his friends trying to escape from an island they crashed upon.

Excerpt from the back of the original Shipwrecked Box:

“BUCKY AND HIS FRIENDS NEED YOUR HELP!
After a sudden crash during a routine fishing trip, Bucky ends up on a mysterious island, where his friends appear to be apprehended by a pack of wolves for disturbing the peace. Embark on a puzzle-based adventure, as Bucky wanders the vast island of Nulla Terra, helping his friends work off the damages, fix your boat, and get back home!”

name: Super Mario Bros. Demake
description: A demake of Super Mario Bros. for PICO-8 featuring 5 levels.

name: Boxhead: The Zombie Wars
description: Your task consists on shooting the dangerous zombies any way you can. You can choose between different levels and game modes.

name: Boxhead: The Rooms
description: How long can you survive against the zombie onslaught.

name: Crazy Taxi Next
description: Crazy Taxi Next was a game that was announced at Microsoft's E3 2001 Press Conference, it would have featured online play and a day/night cycle with changing passengers and locations. However, the final release of Crazy Taxi Next was scaled back and dropped these innovations in favor of a much more direct sequel to Crazy Taxi 2.

name: Doomed: Demons of the Nether
description: An ambitious Minecraft adventure map based on the recent DOOM games by id Software.

name: Cosmos
description: Sin descripción

name: SCP Foundation Dungeon
description: Adds the SCP foundation as a dungeon that can spawn (by default on Titan, config can be adjusted to spawn on a variety of different moons including custom ones) Includes custom assets in the SCP style, and a fully functional SCP 914 if you can find it.

name: Pipework
description: Researchers discovered an enigmatic fluid resembling water in an unexplored and unfamiliar region. Your task is to navigate its journey to various laboratories worldwide, ensuring its safety by protecting it from any potential adverse reactions.

You stumble upon two girls who appear to be filming a fight scene, only to discover it's a real magical battle! You recognize one of the girls and impulsively jump in to protect her, only to be left in critical condition after being struck by powerful magic. In order to save your life, you’ve been transformed into a little, fluffy animal. Now, to reclaim your human form, you must assist your new magical friends in their quest against evil—as a familiar!

name: Zumbi Blocks 2

name: War-Torn Versnag
description:
30 years after the first Versnag War, conflict again threatens to erupt between the Anchis Empire and the bordering kingdom of Zenarg. As they head towards the precipice, two adventurers—young stalwart Zalek and plucky veteran Kinissh—get caught in the chaos. They soon realize the war's scope extends far beyond the mortal coil, with rumors of a primordial dragon's return looming upon the realm. Elsewhere, Zalek's mentor Rommel asks his other disciple, Ron, to join the duo, while Princess Eve of the religious capital Romo learns about her true powers. It's up to them and others to thwart Anchis' new king and stop the dark one's revival.

War-Torn Versnag is a heavily story-driven JRPG divided into chapters. You play Zalek and other party members as they wander between towns, dungeons, and other locations to do battle and advance the plot. Combat normally plays out automatically, but players can tweak characters' behaviors or manually control them as well. The game uses mouse-based controls, a rarity for X68000 exclusives; it released after much delay, late into the system's lifecycle.

name: Super Blox
description:
SuperBlox is a shareware tetris clone with all the expected mechanics. The main difference this game does is that it has dynamic playing field, meaning specific blocks will at random points in the game will shift up or down in order to add more difficulty or randomness.
Another element that is also added are the addition of bombs, which will be dropped rarely but will help out clear out blocks.

The registered version of this game included full sound and music support (pc speakers only for shareware), support for joystick and mouse, and more.

Without this book, humans lose their ability to dream and use their imagination. Many elves have tried desperately to get the pages but without success. So they ask you to help them get their precious book back through a difficult parkour.

name: Shield Shifter
description:
Shield Shifter is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by John Reder / Tactical Neuronics. It was given a limited cartridge release by Good Deal Games. Shield Shifter was later included on the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently on the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

The player controls a turret at the bottom of the screen, firing up at three shield layers that loop horizontally. The goal is to create an opening in the third layer and hit the insectoid hiding behind it, which continuously fires at the player.

name: Sunkissed City
description: Sunkissed City is a life-sim set in an upbeat, sun-kissed seaside metropolis full of funky vibes and quirky characters. Stake out your new life in the city, tending to DIY gardens, learning new skills, and making life-long friends and help bring life back to its once-vibrant streets!

name: Toribash Next
description: Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, a turn-based sandbox fighting game. Toribash allows players to create their own moves during a match, using 3D physics tools. Toribash Next features weapons, four-player battles and a new replay editor, plus more customization and modding options.

name: Yuuki Yuuna ha Yuusha de Aru: Hanayui no Kirameki vol.1
description:
YuYuYui is a VN featuring an original story as well as a retelling of the YuYuYu anime and WaSuYu and NoWaYu light novels in VN format.
Originally a mobile gacha game, the story sections were ported on consoles and divided into 8 volumes, with each volume featuring new bonus chapters.

Since he’ll be busy preparing for university entrance exams next year, he thought that this summer vacation would be the best time to make memories with his girlfriend. But how would he spend his time together with her…? If you were in his place, would you take the lead or leave it all up to her?

You, Caroline Phenix, condemned to the depths of hell.
But why are you here? How did you die? Are you really dead? Will you ever see the light of day again?
Try escaping hell while slowly becoming a demon yourself!

name: Block Blast!
description:
Block Blast! A perfect mix of block and jigsaw puzzle games, combining creativity with the classics! The simple control, wonderful sound effects, and a great rhythm! Block Blast will leave you wanting more!

Aside from the classical block puzzle games, you will also experience a whole new original COMBO gameplay. Drag and drop block puzzles onto the board to fill a row or column to complete elimination and clearing multiple rows or columns at once will produce a cool elimination animation as well as extra points. The more COMBOs you perform, the more points you get in a block puzzle game. It is up to your logical skills and layout strategy if you want to score high points. Test your IQ and exercise your brain in a block puzzle game!

name: Pico Zelda

name: Frostpunk Pico
description:
A demake of Frostpunk for PICO-8.

Welcome to the frigid wastes of Northern England. The world is cooling, London is in disarray, and there is no end in sight. You are charged with helping your group of refugees survive the cold. This task will be daunting and dangerous, but you are not without hope.

name: Neon Shift
description: Neon Shift is a speedrun-focused, side-scrolling platformer with a twist! Run, jump and slide your way through both official and player-created levels as fast as possible, then shift into a phantom that can uncover new routes with a dash and chase yourself down to secure a spot on the leaderboard.

name: Battleship
description:
Take command of a U.S. Naval fleet to wage war against an unknown alien force. Secure the seas, before it's too late.

The Wii/DS/3DS versions feature a turn based strategy gameplay approach not found in the PS3/X360 version.

name: Basketball Shoot
description:
Basketball Shoot is an simple but very addictive game which base on realistic physics.
The quantity of the basketballs is limited,your goal is to shoot them for a better score.

name: LEGO The Lord of the Rings
description:
Based on The Lord of the Rings motion picture trilogy, LEGO The Lord of the Rings follows the original storylines of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, taking players through the epic story events reimagined with the humor and endless variety of LEGO play.

Trusted with the dangerous task to destroy an ancient magical ring that threatens all that is good, Frodo is forced to leave his peaceful home. But the ring wants to be found and the road to Mount Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed, will be perilous and riddled with Orcs and fouler things.

To help Frodo, a Fellowship is formed —Aragorn the Ranger, Gandalf the Wizard, Legolas the Elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Boromir a Man of Gondor, and Frodo’s Hobbit friends Sam, Merry and Pippin. Players relive the legend through the LEGO minifigures, as they explore wonders, solve timeless riddles, and overcome endless foes in their quest to destroy the Ring.

name: Carnival Games
description: Step right up to Carnival Games. Each game is designed from the ground up to take full advantage of the Nintendo DS control mechanism. A frenzied combination of tapping, blowing, speaking and stylus maneuvering brings the now-famous midway to life!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Nordic Horizons
description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 reveals another upcoming map expansion, the Nordic Horizons, taking players through the captivating landscapes of northern Europe!

The expansion features expansive fjords of Norway all the way to the Arctic Ocean, challenging bridges, underwater tunnels, and narrow roads, complete with encounters with reindeer and coastal fishing villages. Drive through Sweden’s Norrland, offering a diverse environment, from settled regions along the main E4 road to the barren hills of the Scandinavian mountains. Finland’s Lapland, with its dense coniferous forests to the expansive barren tundra, presents a stark contrast to the southern part of the country

The DLC includes tens of cities and towns, showcasing typical Nordic architecture and delving into Viking history. Additionally, Nordic Horizons promises a seamless blend of nature, history, and trucking excitement, offering players an unforgettable Nordic adventure. Get ready for a seriously big adventure with this expansion which offers so much to explore!

name: DarkScape
description: DarkScape was a variant of RuneScape, announced on 16 September 2015. It was a fork of the main RuneScape code as of late May 2015, featuring an open PvP environment without "safe zones". Furthermore, only Legacy Mode combat was available; everyone started at combat level 3; and progress in RuneScape did not affect DarkScape in any way.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu
description:
Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyū is a 2014 mobile arcade Baseball simulator game published by Konami that shares the same name of the main series. Although this game never went outside Japan, it still managed to reach over 3.9 million download counts.

The game's main focus is the "Success Mode", which is a game mode where you create your own character while advancing through one of several story modes, developing his baseball stats until you finally get to use the character freely after you've completed the Success Mode. All the stories are high school-themed, with the Koshien Stadium's tournament as the goal.

Also available are free play and Pennant Race modes to put your Pawapuro-kuns in, as well as competitive matches between players.

As a Japanese mobile game, you can open gachapon/loot boxes to unlock new characters. You can choose which ones will be featured into any of the Success Mode scenarios as CPU-controlled allies and then change your character's default skin to one of them after clearing a scenario.

He'll have to confront his rival Lance and the Kaiser to reclaim his homeland and the Sacred Sword Langrisser. However, both sides will be observed closely by the watchful eyes of the darkness. The fate of Langrisser, Baldea, and the entire continent of El Sallia will be determined by the choices you make.

This is a hack I wanted to make for fun when I first joined this community.
I started making this hack with learning lunar magic for the first time and slowly throughout the creation of this hack I learned countless things about both the game and editor.
I fell in love with it all the moment I started tinkering with it and after helping a friend work on LoM I decided I'd make my own hack.

Only 2 stages were close to completion, being a remake of Ragnarok's Cavern and a side scrolling stage similar to Artic Caverns.

name: Adventure II
description:
Adventure II is a homebrew for the Atari 5200 programmed by Ron Lloyd and Alan Davis, with graphics by Keith Erickson. AtariAge began producing cartridges for the game in 2007.

The Enchanted Chalice is once again missing, and it's the player's mission to return it to the Seashore Kingdom's Castle, navigating through several mazes and kingdoms, and avoiding three dragons, a minotaur and a troll.

Welcome to Yaten's Horror Session. You only have one misson. Find all objects.

You have to find the objects and be careful against the animatronics. They don't want you here. You should avoid them.
Every animatronic has a characteristic feature. You have to find their characteristic feature and use against them.

name: Pippa Funnell: Ranch Rescue
description: Budding equestrians play as Estelle, who belongs to the Pippa Funnell horse riding team. Estelle has to find out how to make her team successful, through exploring her environment and talking to her team mates. By competing in cross country events and show jumping trials, she wins new horses and better equipment which in turn help to win more competitions! Pippa Funnell: The Stud Farm Inheritance is a must-have game for anyone who has ever dreamed of becoming a world class horse rider!

description:
Hagrid makes his return in this mind-breaking sequel to the all-time bestselling piece of software junk "Escape PS1 Hagrid". With over 200 game of the year awards, before the release this game happens to be a more than worthy successor to its predecessor.
